channel.title: Highscores
channel.description: I'm attempting to add high-scores for my server (I'm using a vps) and i get this error everytime it attempts to save someones high-scores. [code]java.sql.SQLException: null, message from server: "Host '*******' is not allowe d to connect to this MySQL server" at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:946) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1053) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2743) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at SQL.query(SQL.java:31) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:50) at Client.ActionButtons(Client.java:8693) at Client.UsePacket(Client.java:37635) at Client.PacketProcess(Client.java:26192) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:410) at Server.main(Server.java:94) java.lang.NullPointerException at SQL.query(SQL.java:26) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:50) at Client.ActionButtons(Client.java:8693) at Client.UsePacket(Client.java:37635) at Client.PacketProcess(Client.java:26192) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:410) at Server.main(Server.java:94)[/code]

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:

Hey man ur sig says u make free webclients would u help me out?

Gabriel_Highscore
Than go into that user and set the ips

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

nope, you have to make a new user in mysql and give it full permissions
(use same user and pass u used for the control panel thing that was in dutch on the tut)

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

I believe in the VPS system you can’t change what you need done.
Im hosting through hostgator all i do is go into mySQL and add the IP of which computer is running the server with a % at the end to mean any computer on that line (wildcard)
Hope it helps some.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @RedFalconBlue RedFalconBlue
item.description:
@RedFalconBlue wrote:

I’m attempting to add high-scores for my server (I’m using a vps) and i get this error everytime it attempts to save someones high-scores.

java.sql.SQLException: null, message from server: "Host '*******' is not allowe d to connect to this MySQL server" at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:946) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1053) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2743) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at SQL.query(SQL.java:31) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:50) at Client.ActionButtons(Client.java:8693) at Client.UsePacket(Client.java:37635) at Client.PacketProcess(Client.java:26192) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:410) at Server.main(Server.java:94) java.lang.NullPointerException at SQL.query(SQL.java:26) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:50) at Client.ActionButtons(Client.java:8693) at Client.UsePacket(Client.java:37635) at Client.PacketProcess(Client.java:26192) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:410) at Server.main(Server.java:94)

Read full topic
